review: I bought the Fire Stick as a long time Amazon Prime member to take advantage of all the free content.  There is a lot of free content, but I was disappointed to find that you get a lot of stuff pushed at you that has to be purchased.  If you search for a TV series, the first thing you see is not the free episode 1 of season 1, you get the latest season, where each episode is $3!  Any many long running series don't offer any free episodes at all.  Any you can't rent fairly recent movies.  They have to be purchased for around $20.  What good is that?The remote and navigation controls are very intuitive and easy to use.  However, the organization of the content leaves a little to desired.  While the categories labeled Prime are free with Prime, everywhere else is a random mix of free vs pay_for items, so when you see something you like, you have to look and see whether its free of not, and chances are very high that it's not free.
